sources.autograph: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, D.L33, 'Sonata a quattro no. 11...' (for comment, see No. 171)

ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.611a, 'Quartetto no. 5...' (for comment, see No. 171)
Münster, Priesterseminarbibliothek, Santini HS. 533, 'Opera III, Concerto quinto...' (for comment, see No. 171). The last movement is entitled 'Affettuoso', without any mention of a trio
Naples, Conservatorio. Two copies: 22.2.10, and 22.5.2, 'Quartetto no. 5...'
sources.first_edition: December, 1772, Paris, Vénier: Op. 10 no. 4 (for title, see No. 171)

(c. 1785), Amsterdam, Hummel: Op. 7 no. 4 (for title, see No. 171)

entries.notes: Third movement includes a Trio section
